item.description:

well i recently added skill cape requirements, but smithing isnt working, this is code, any1 know whats wrong?

public int GetCLSmithing(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == 14123) { return 100; } if (ItemID == 14121) { return 100; } return 1; }
